title: Step-by-Step Guide to Monitoring AI Agents—Part 1
title1: Step-by-Step Guide to Monitoring AI Agents—Part 1
title2: Step-by-Step Guide to Monitoring AI Agents—Part 1
description: Building bug-free and efficient AI agents requires robust monitoring. In this first part of our two-part guide, we'll build a simple AI agent and optimize it's performance by leveraging Helicone's agentic AI observability features.
author: Yusu
